com.scvngr.levelup.core.ui.view

Interface LevelUpCodeCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HashMapCache

    @ThreadSafe
public interface LevelUpCodeCache
    A cache for LevelUp payment codes. This is used by LevelUpCodeLoader. This cache must be thread safe.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LevelUpQrCodeGenerator.LevelUpQrCodeImage getCode(String key) 
      boolean hasCode(String key) 
      void putCode(String key, LevelUpQrCodeGenerator.LevelUpQrCodeImage image) 

    • Method Detail

      • putCode

        void putCode(String key,
           LevelUpQrCodeGenerator.LevelUpQrCodeImage image)
        Parameters:
        key - the key under which to store the code. This should be unique for each code.
        image - the code image. This should be the smallest-possible code image.

      • getCode

        LevelUpQrCodeGenerator.LevelUpQrCodeImage getCode(String key)
        Parameters:
        key - the key under which the image is stored.
        Returns:
        the cached code image or null if there is no entry.

      • hasCode

        boolean hasCode(String key)
        Parameters:
        key - the key under which the image is stored.
        Returns:
        true if the cache has a mapping for the given key.
